      This API si deprecated, we encourage developer to override comparingPredicate() instead

      Returns:
      a function for sorting properties in validation stream

    • evaluateMethod

      protected Control evaluateMethod​(A a, Method... methods) throws Exception

      Validate method with a generic validate interface

      Parameters:
      a - annotation that must expose a method to retrieve a Converter
      methods - , method to validate
      Returns:
      true if method return a valid value
      Throws:
      Exception - if not valid

    • customFilter

      protected Boolean customFilter​(Method m)
      Parameters:
      m - A property getter to filter
      Returns:
      true if the property should be included in validation stream

    • invokeOnNull

      protected <R> Function<Method,​R> invokeOnNull​(FunctionalWrapper<Method,​R,​Exception> throwingFunction, Function<Method,​R> fallback)

      Handy way to provide a fallback in functional java

      Invoke method against a class and uses fallback in case of null property

      Type Parameters:
      R - parametric return type
      Parameters:
      throwingFunction - wraps method invocation
      fallback - invoked when throwingFunction results null
      Returns:
      result of the invocation in throwingFunction or value provided from fallback function
      Throws:
      E - on evaluation failure

    • invokeOnNull

      protected <R> Function<Method,​R> invokeOnNull​(FunctionalWrapper<Method,​R,​Exception> throwingFunction, Supplier<R> fallback)
      Same as invokeOnNull(FunctionalWrapper, Function) but takes a supplier instead of a function (no params needed)

    • fetchMethod

      @Deprecated(since="v0.1.1", forRemoval=true) protected Function<? super String,​Method> fetchMethod​(FunctionalWrapper<String,​Method,​NoSuchMethodException> throwingFunction) throws RuntimeException
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.

      Return getter method starting from property name

      Parameters:
      throwingFunction - algorithm to retrieve a getMethod using its name
      Returns:
      the method of the given class
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if method is not found or other exceptions are catch

      Parameters:
